Articles.Content:
During a break in modding to play 0.90 before 1.0, I took the [STS Challenge](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112399-STS-Space-Shuttle-Challenges-PROVE-YOUR-PILOTING-METTLE-Earn-a-Badge!) by Inigma- and created an episodic story around it! I learned quite a bit about creating videos with KSP, in the process. I have much more to learn, but I thought you'd enjoy these:

Episode One: New Beginnings

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/cMJmedsl_dQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Episode Two: Training Day

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/cbMZZIwbhsc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Episode Three: Flight of the Falcon

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/HoBEsFrbORk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Awesome! 

But I do have one question.

Do you have to use thrust limiter for the SSE Engines on the shuttle? Since the boosters have liquid fuel engines, if you throttle down then the boosters throttle down.

What do you do to get around that?
Would really like to see more of this!
